name: Country Balls Io: Battle Arena
description:
Play as your favorite Countryball. Become a legend by leading massive Countryball armies and rule the World!

Features:
• Select Your Country
• Real Time Strategy (RTS)
• Big armies expansion
• Various character customization
• Conquer states and territories in the epic clash game
• Build your own Countryball!

*The game is designed for entertainment purposes only. Any similarities to the real world and geopolitical situation are coincidental.*
